mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spmember_detail ( mem_num, name, passwd, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2) VALUES ( #{mem_num}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_num, u.employee_code, u.authority, d.passwd, d.email, d.user_name, d.department_num, dept.department_name AS department_name, d.position_num, d.grade_num FROM euser u JOIN euser_detail d ON u.user_num = d.user_num LEFT JOIN department dept ON d.department_num = dept.department_num WHERE u.employee_code=#{employee_code}
